description: Are you ready to go nuts for this rich, creamy South Indian and Sri Lankan cashew curry? Giving you fantastic taste, texture and colour. It's a creamy vegan curry dream!

notes: Add some heat to your curry by incorporating a spicier chili powder into the sauce or throwing in some fresh green chilies with the cashews. The level of spiciness is entirely up to you! For an authentic touch, consider adding green peas, spinach, fresh or frozen fenugreek leaves, potatoes, chickpeas, or other vegetables and pulses to your Kaju Maluwa. Experiment with different combinations to achieve a variety of flavors and textures. Just be sure to adjust the cooking time accordingly and possibly add more liquid if needed. Serving and storing suggestions Cashew Curry stores well in the freezer - keep in airtight containers for up to 3 months. Cook from frozen until hot. In the fridge I'll be good for 4-5 days, sealed in an airtight container.
